page.title: 01PREFACE
page.content: . This block comprises most of the parish of Cratfield with part of the parishes of Laxfield, Fressingfield and Linstead. A small village, Cratfield lies roughly at the centre with two hamlets, Silverleys Green in the North West corner and Swan Green about a kilometre further South. Under four hundred people live here. With so few people services are basic _ mains water and electricity are available to all.Though still completely rural the area is changing. Twenty years ago the population was mostly local people, intricately related and declining in numbers, then retired people began to move in, but now it is younger people with young families who come and the population is growing. All children travel by bus to school. Most people work outside the area.
